titles.title: Blessed be the name of the lord most high

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Blessed be the Name of the Lord, (3x)
Most High. (Repeat.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The Name of the Lord is a strong tower,
The righteous run into it, and they are safe. (Repeat.)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The Spirit of the Lord is, Now upon us,
To open the prison doors, set the captives free.(Repeat.)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Bendito sea el nombre de Dios (3x)
Jehova.(repetir)

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
El nombre de Dios es,
Fuerte torre.
Los justos corren a El y salvos son.
